## Context.ContextTokens.partialContextToContextToken() method

Converts a validated partial context to a [context token](./ts-res.contexttoken.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static partialContextToContextToken(context: IValidatedContextDecl): Result<string>;
```

Result&lt;string&gt;
